name: Incredible Hulk
description: Incredible Hulk is a sativa strain that harnesses the active and stimulating effects of its parent strains, Green Crack and Jack Herer. Creativity and social energy get a boost while blueberry, pineapple, and earthy flavors overwhelm the palate. This high-energy sativa is preferred as a daytime remedy for minor aches and pains.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Focused, Euphoric, Creative, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Insomnia, Stress, Depression, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Headache
